mapper.select: SELECT product_id AS id, product_name AS name, stock FROM product
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_id, category, product_name, price, stock, code, info, product_img_url) VALUES (#{productId}, #{category}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{code}, #{info}, #{productImgUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET category = #{category}, product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, code = #{code}, info = #{info}, product_img_url = #{productImgUrl} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
